greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = n + 2 - (number of divisors of n).
reference: L. Comtet, Advanced Combinatorics, Reidel, 1974, p. 121, see #17.
link: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..5000
mathematica: Table[n + 2 - DivisorSigma[0, n], {n,1,100}] (* _G. C. Greubel_, Jan 04 2017 *)
program: (PARI) { for (n = 1, 5000, write("b059292.txt", n, " ", n + 2 - numdiv(n)); ) } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Jun 25 2009
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jan 25 2001
